top10_tweets_like: Hey #rstats, your periodic reminder that `glue::glue()` is vectorized: https://t.co/N5sNIBDA04
Well this was a new R warning message for me; I guess my data are just too perfect! #RStats #Nonsense https://t.co/MbDv2oqsg7

Here's ten practical examples of new ways of doing common data tasks in the #tidyverse.   With recent updates to #dplyr and #tidyr there's more flexibility and more control. Thanks @allison_horst for {palmerpenguins}.  #rstats #r4ds #tidyverse #datascience https://t.co/i0UlpXDOeJ

Free #rstats package idea: {figr}. Insert placeholder figures in an R Markdown document, but the images are randomly chosen from the USDA's library of pomological watercolor paintings of figs here: https://t.co/T7o1c2QywW https://t.co/SWGTVbIcih
My favorite part about the new Palmer penguins dataset for #rstats is the built-in Simpson's Paradox https://t.co/3o2oynB56Q https://t.co/MOCpWXPiWG
